title: Bug 36936Error when introducing members of type Class
description: Bug 36936Error when introducing members of type Class
OB: Using AspectJ 1.1 RC1public aspect Asp {public Class Trg.member = String.class;}public class Trg {public static void main(String args[]) {new Trg();System.out.println("All ok");}}Compiling with "ajc Asp.java Trg.java" and running Trg, prints "All ok", as it should.Compiling with "ajc Trg.java Asp.java" and running Trg gives:Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: class$0at Asp.ajc$interFieldInit$Asp$Trg$member(Asp.java:2)at Trg.<init(Trg.java:1)at Trg.main(Trg.java:3)Note, introduced field must be of type Class, or array of Classes, works fine else.
